ticket1.title: Car problem
ticket1.messageContent: Thank you very much Yohan, you've saved my business! You guys fixed it so fast, that I can't be more thankful... I've never seen such talented people. If I experience some more problems with the engine I will send you a message, but for now it works like a charm. Cheers!

ticket1.title: Message 1
ticket1.messageContent: That's really sad. I will check if we have it in stock, so we can replace it with the engine, but usually we have plenty of these for cars like yours, so no worries. We will be waiting for you at 4 PM.

ticket1.title: Message 1
ticket1.messageContent: That's really great! Yes, I will come at 4 PM, is that okay with you? And yeah... Some drunken people broke my side window in the morning, is it possible to replace it while fixing the engine?

ticket1.title: Message 1
ticket1.messageContent: Hello, it looks like there's a problem with the turbo. You have to come here, so we can diagnose the exact problem. We can make the diagnostic pretty fast, so will tell you then how serious the problem really is. If you need the car for your business and we can't fix it that day, we provide you our car for the days we're working on yours. Can you come today afternnon?

ticket1.title: Message 1
ticket1.messageContent: Hello, I have a problem with my car. Whenever I start the engine, it sounds really bad. I mean it lasts during the whole car ride and it also can't go fast now, I can have my foot on the floor and it won't go faster than 80kph. I've tried to open the mask, but can't really hear the exact part where it is coming from. I mean, I don't know what to do now. I need my car for my business every day, so I hope it is not something serious. Could you help me with this, please?

ticket2.title: Car crash
ticket2.messageContent: Money isn't a problem. I just want my wife to be happy! Please try it, I count on you.

ticket2.title: Message 1
ticket2.messageContent: I'm sorry to say that, but we've checked the car and the engine is broken, so teoretically it can be fixed, but it could be very expensive.

ticket2.title: Message 1
ticket2.messageContent: Yes, sure, I hope you can find the way to fix it, it was her favorite car...

ticket2.title: Message 1
ticket2.messageContent: Hello John, the car may look destroyed from outside, but what is more important is under its skin. We will come for the car and let you know. Can we come in the morning?

ticket2.title: Car crash
ticket2.messageContent: My wife just crashed my car, that's not something unusual though, but look at what she did, I really can't understand how could this eventually happen. Guys, is it possible to fix this? I mean you fixed everething my wife broke, but this looks pretty serious. Please let me know if you can help.

ticket3.title: Message 1
ticket3.messageContent: Okay, I hope he gets well... Thanks for the help.

ticket3.title: Message 1
ticket3.messageContent: Hello. If it doesn't get better in a week, go with it to see a doctor. From the picture you sent me it looks like a regular flu. Just give it a rest.

ticket3.title: Message 1
ticket3.messageContent: My car has high temperature all the time, I don't know what to do.. I gave it ton of Paralen in the fuel tank, but it didn't work, really.. Please help me.
